Articles.Content:
I've said it, but now I gotta scram to figure out a lag problem I'm having. It's just rude for me to post in the support section without saying "hello" first!

Oh and expect to be seeing me again, perhaps soon. And hopefully more often in a helpful way!

Princess Zelda isn't around here. Or as far as I know.

Welcome to the forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Thank you Capt'n! But most of my launches ends up blown up instead!

Princess Zelda isn't around here. Or as far as I know.

Welcome to the forums!

She's here.....strapped to a rocket and waiting to goto the mun. Sorry but I got tired of her yapping all the time so, Screw it, she's getting sent off. No more rescuing her!

I was going to make a Zelda reference too, but looks like I've been beaten too it...

*plays ocarina and warps back to the space craft*

Oh, and welcome to the KSP forums!
